files.escmode.ini:
; camera 360 movement around the car in the pits
[SETTINGS]
POSITION=0, 1.4, 3.2	; position from the center of CoG in XYZ meters
FOV=45			; Field of View angle of the camera
files.car.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=2 ; version number

[INFO]
SCREEN_NAME=Nissan Silvia S15 WDT Street 	; Name of the car. Used on info apps ingame and to identify the car on servers etc.

[BASIC]
GRAPHICS_OFFSET=0,-0.49,-0.08					; 3 axis correction (x,y,z), applies only to the 3D object of the car (meters)
GRAPHICS_PITCH_ROTATION=-0.5				; Changes 3D object rotation in pitch (degrees)
TOTALMASS=1320						; Total vehicle weight in kg with driver and no fuel
INERTIA=1.70,1.3,4.8						; Car polar inertia. Calculated from the car dimensions. Start with the generic width,height,length and modify accordingly to the car's configuration 

[GRAPHICS]
DRIVEREYES=-0.357528,0.997329,-0.255560
ONBOARD_EXPOSURE=23
OUTBOARD_EXPOSURE=30
ON_BOARD_PITCH_ANGLE=-1.874098
BUMPER_CAMERA_POS=0.0,0.34,2.2				; Bumper camera position (meters)
BONNET_CAMERA_POS=0.0,1.04,-0.18				; Bonnet camera position (meters)
MIRROR_POSITION=0.0,1.3,0.5 				; Position used to render the mirror
SHAKE_MUL=3								; Camera onboard G forces multiplier 
USE_ANIMATED_SUSPENSIONS=0					; Use animated suspensions (1) or not (0). Animated suspensions will not be updated in real time from setup changes.
FUEL_LIGHT_MIN_LITERS=3						; Minimum fuel load to activate the Fuel indicator icon
BUMPER_CAMERA_PITCH=0						; bumper camera pitch angle
BONNET_CAMERA_PITCH=-8						; bonnet camera pitch angle
CHASE_CAMERA_PITCH=0						; chase camera pitch angle

[CONTROLS]
FFMULT=1.7
STEER_ASSIST=1.000
STEER_LOCK=450			
STEER_RATIO=-9.7	
LINEAR_STEER_ROD_RATIO=0.00198	
; Enter AC in dev app mode enabled
; Open SUSPENSIONS app
; turn your steering wheel by 90 degrees
; check the actual steer ratio value
; modify LINEAR_STEER_ROD_RATIO value until ingame steer ratio and car.ini STEER_RATIO values are similar

[FUEL]
CONSUMPTION=0.0035							; fuel consumption. In one second the consumption is (rpm*gas*CONSUMPTION)/1000 litres
FUEL=30									; default starting fuel in litres
MAX_FUEL=50									; max fuel in litres

[FUELTANK]
POSITION=0,-0.0,-1.6					; Position of fuel tank from CoG in meters

[RIDE]
PICKUP_FRONT_HEIGHT=-0.350					; Height of the front ride height pickup point in meters WRT cg
PICKUP_REAR_HEIGHT=-0.350					; Height of the rear ride height pickup point in meters WRT cg

[PIT_STOP]
TYRE_CHANGE_TIME_SEC=10            ; time spent to change each tyre
FUEL_LITER_TIME_SEC=0.6   ; time spent to put 1 lt of fuel inside the car
BODY_REPAIR_TIME_SEC=20    ; time spent to repair 10% of body damage
ENGINE_REPAIR_TIME_SEC=2  ; time spent to repair 10% of engine damage
SUSP_REPAIR_TIME_SEC=30   ; time spent to repair 10% of suspension damage

files.drivetrain.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=3

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD					; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5				; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382			; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=2.595		
GEAR_2=1.765		
GEAR_3=1.250	
GEAR_4=1.000	
GEAR_5=0.833

FINAL=4.6		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=1			; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=1			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=80			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=500

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1				; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
FORCED_ON=0

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=180				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=1500				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100
[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7700
DOWN=4000
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.290

[HEADER]
VERSION=2

[WING_0]
NAME=BODY							; name of the wing
CHORD=1								; length of the wing in meters
SPAN=2								; width of the wing in meters. both help determine the frontal area
POSITION=0,0.10,-0.30						; position in x,y,z starting from the CoG
LUT_AOA_CL=wing_body_AOA_CL.lut		; Coefficient of Lift lookup table

[HEADER]
VERSION=2

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD					; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5				; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.768			; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.25	
GEAR_2=1.955		
GEAR_3=1.31	
GEAR_4=1.00	
GEAR_5=0.753	

FINAL=3.7		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=1		; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=1			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=90			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=600

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts

MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=180				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=1500				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100

[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7000
DOWN=3900
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.300

files.drivetrain.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=3

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD					; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5				; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.0			; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=2.6	
GEAR_2=1.8
GEAR_3=1.35	
GEAR_4=1.00	
GEAR_5=0.85

FINAL=4.8		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.9			; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.9			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=80			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=300

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1				; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
FORCED_ON=0

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=280				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=600				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100
[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7850
DOWN=4100
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.300

[HEADER]

; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count

GEAR_3=1.31	
GEAR_4=1.00	
GEAR_5=0.753	

FINAL=3.9		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8		; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=50			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=550

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1				; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=180				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=1500				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100

[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7000
DOWN=3900
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.300

files.drivetrain.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=3

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD					; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5				; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382			; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=2.595		
GEAR_2=1.765		
GEAR_3=1.250	
GEAR_4=1.000	
GEAR_5=0.833

FINAL=4.6		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8			; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=50			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=500

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1				; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
FORCED_ON=0

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=180				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=1500				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100
[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7700
DOWN=4000
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.290

[HEADER]
VERSION=3

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD					; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5				; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.369			; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=2.595		
GEAR_2=1.765		
GEAR_3=1.250	
GEAR_4=1.000	
GEAR_5=0.833

FINAL=4.36		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8			; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=50			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=550

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1				; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
FORCED_ON=0

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=180				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=1500				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100
[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7000
DOWN=3500
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.290

[HEADER]
VERSION=3

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD					; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5				; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.369			; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=2.595		
GEAR_2=1.765		
GEAR_3=1.250	
GEAR_4=1.000	
GEAR_5=0.833

FINAL=4.36		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.9			; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.9			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=70			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=500

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1				; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
FORCED_ON=0

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=180				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=1500				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100
[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7000
DOWN=3500
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.290

NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.993 				; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.997				; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=1.7 				; Maximum boost generated regardless of wastegate. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=0.55				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=0.55		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=7000			; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=1.5
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1

[TURBO_1]
LAG_DN=0.993 				; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.997				; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=1.7 				; Maximum boost generated regardless of wastegate. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=0.55				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=0.55		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=7000			; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=1.5
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1


[DAMAGE]
TURBO_BOOST_THRESHOLD=1.5  ; level of TOTAL boost before the engine starts to take damage
TURBO_DAMAGE_K=5			; amount of damage per second per (boost - threshold)
RPM_THRESHOLD=8500			; RPM at which the engine starts to take damage
RPM_DAMAGE_K=1

[HEADER]
VERSION=2

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD					; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5				; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.768			; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.25	
GEAR_2=1.955		
GEAR_3=1.31	
GEAR_4=1.00	
GEAR_5=0.753	

FINAL=3.9		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=1		; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=1			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=90			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=550

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1				; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=180				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=1500				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100

[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7000
DOWN=3900
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.300

[HEADER]
VERSION=3

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD					; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5				; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382			; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.321		
GEAR_2=1.902		
GEAR_3=1.308	
GEAR_4=1.000	
GEAR_5=0.759

FINAL=4.36		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8			; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=50			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=500

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1				; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
FORCED_ON=0

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=180				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=1500				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100
[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7000
DOWN=4000
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.290

files.drivetrain.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=3

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD					; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5				; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382			; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.321		
GEAR_2=1.902		
GEAR_3=1.308	
GEAR_4=1.000	
GEAR_5=0.759

FINAL=4.36		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8			; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=50			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=500

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1				; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
FORCED_ON=0

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=180				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=1500				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100
[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7000
DOWN=4000
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.290

files.drivetrain.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=3

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD					; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5				; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.369			; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.214		
GEAR_2=1.925	
GEAR_3=1.302	
GEAR_4=1.000	
GEAR_5=0.752

FINAL=4.1		; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.9			; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.9			; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=70			; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=260		; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=270		; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=260		; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1		; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles 
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=800			;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4			;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.0182					; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=550

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE			; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE	; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1				; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1200					; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=1800					; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
FORCED_ON=0

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=50				; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=180				; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=1500				; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0				; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=20				; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=140				; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=200			; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.8				; Gas level to be reached

[DAMAGE]
RPM_WINDOW_K=100
[AUTO_SHIFTER]
UP=7000
DOWN=3500
SLIP_THRESHOLD=0.95
GAS_CUTOFF_TIME=0.290

files.engine.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=1
POWER_CURVE=power.lut				; power curve file
COAST_CURVE=FROM_COAST_REF 			; coast curve. can define 3 different options (coast reference, coast values for mathematical curve, coast curve file)
	
[ENGINE_DATA]
ALTITUDE_SENSITIVITY=0.1			; sensitivity to altitude
INERTIA=0.17					; engine inertia
LIMITER=7500					; engine rev limiter. 0 no limiter
LIMITER_HZ=50					; Frequency of engine limiter
MINIMUM=900					; Idle rpm
DEFAULT_TURBO_ADJUSTMENT=0.8			; DEFAULT turbo adjustment if one or more turbos are cockpit adjustable

[COAST_REF]
RPM=8500					; rev number reference
TORQUE=100					; engine braking torque value in Nm at rev number reference
NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

[COAST_DATA]
COAST0=0						; 
COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]
FILENAME=coast.lut				; coasting curve file

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.993 				; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.997				; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=1.7 				; Maximum boost generated regardless of wastegate. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=0.55				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=0.55		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=7200			; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=1.5
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1

[TURBO_1]
LAG_DN=0.993 				; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.997				; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=1.7 				; Maximum boost generated regardless of wastegate. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=0.55				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=0.55		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=7200			; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=1.5
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1


[DAMAGE]
TURBO_BOOST_THRESHOLD=1.5  ; level of TOTAL boost before the engine starts to take damage
TURBO_DAMAGE_K=5			; amount of damage per second per (boost - threshold)
RPM_THRESHOLD=8500			; RPM at which the engine starts to take damage
RPM_DAMAGE_K=1
